QuestData.Title: A Source of Terrifying Power
QuestData.Description: <The clutch-keepers seem to be using these blinding white crystals as magical foci. Peering inside, you see thick tendrils of black smoke swirling in the center. One of the workers at Klaxxi'vess may know more about this material and why it is so abundant in the wastes.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Sha-Haunted Crystal to Ambersmith Zikk at Klaxxi'vess.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Sha-Haunted Crystal to Ambersmith Zikk at Klaxxi'vess.
QuestData.RewardText: Do you have any idea what this is? It's amber!$B$BBut it is polluted with fear.$B$BI would not expect an outsider like you to understand the consequences of this.
